config.${APP_HOME}/docker.cfg:
DOCKER_SERVICE_ENABLE=true
DOCKER_OPTIONS=-H unix:///var/run/docker.sock -H tcp://0.0.0.0:4243 --bip=10.88.0.1/24 --exec-opt native.cgroupdriver=cgroupfs --graph=${DATA_BASE}/docker --storage-driver devicemapper --storage-opt dm.fs=xfs --storage-opt dm.basesize=5G --log-opt max-size=100m --log-opt max-file=9 --storage-opt dm.override_udev_sync_check=true
DOCKER_OPTIONS=-H unix:///var/run/docker.sock -H tcp://0.0.0.0:4243 --bip=10.88.0.1/24 --exec-opt native.cgroupdriver=cgroupfs --graph=${DATA_BASE}/docker --storage-driver devicemapper --storage-opt dm.metadatadev=/dev/docker/metadata --storage-opt dm.datadev=/dev/docker/data --storage-opt dm.fs=xfs --storage-opt dm.basesize=5G --log-opt max-size=100m --log-opt max-file=9 --storage-opt dm.override_udev_sync_check=true
DOCKER_NETWORK_NAMES=sobeyficus
DOCKER_NETWORK_NAME.sobeyficus.params=--subnet 11.11.0.0/16
DOCKER_GROUP_USER=docker
